text: "Hammer to Fall" is a 1984 song by the band Queen. It was taken from their 11th studio album The Works and is the fourth and final single. It went to number 3 in South Africa, number 13 in the United Kingdom and number 24 in Poland. It was performed at Live Aid in 1985. == Track listings == 7" Single * A Side. "Hammer to Fall" (Single Version) - 3:40 * B Side. "Tear It Up" - 3:24 12" Single * A Side. "Hammer to Fall" (Extended Version) - 5:25 * B Side. "Tear It Up" - 3:24 == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Hammer to Fall
